title: New technology probes Sydney’s groundwater for the first time (UNSW - The University of New ...
text: ( Source : UNSW - The University of New South Wales ) New technology is providing important insights into how groundwater connects with surface water, which will help protect our water supply, write Katarina David , Andy Baker and Wendy Timms.
